message: I've got a fantastic deal for you, Bob! This product is top-notch and has received rave reviews. I'm only willing to sell it to you for $100. It's a steal at this price, and I'm confident you'll love it. What do you say? Will you take it off my hands?
I'm not sure if I'm ready to commit to buying without knowing the actual quality of the product.
